potion.description: You drink the potion and feel refreshed. Your wounds begin to heal.

magic flower.description: The magic flower heals your wounds and lifts your spirits.

herbal remedy.description: A bundle of herbs with mild healing properties.

torch.description: You light the torch. Shadows retreat around you.

lantern.description: You light the lantern. It brightens your path in the darkness.

sword.description: You grip the sword, feeling braver and ready for combat.

rusty dagger.description: An old dagger, still sharp enough to fend off weak enemies.

shield.description: You raise the shield, feeling protected from the dangers that lurk.

key.description: A small key that unlocks a hidden chest or door.

old coin.description: An ancient coin, worn with age. It might be valuable to the right person.

fishing rod.description: A sturdy fishing rod that might help you catch something useful at the lake.

mysterious gem.description: The gem glows faintly, pulsing with a strange energy. It feels important.

crystal shard.description: A fragment of crystal that hums with power. It might be part of a bigger secret.

scroll of wisdom.description: An ancient scroll filled with cryptic knowledge. Reading it might reveal secrets.

leather pouch.description: A small leather pouch. It can carry up to 3 stackable items.

enchanted fruit.description: A fruit imbued with magic. Eating it restores some health.
